fields.Title of Presentation: <span style="color:#222222;font-size:small;">GenAI supported pre-service teacher lesson planning: A content analysis.</span>
fields.Conference/Meeting Name: Association for Educational Communications and Technology (AECT) Annual International Convention
fields.Sponsoring Organization: Association for Educational Communications and Technology
fields.Description/Abstract: <p><span style="font-weight:400;">This study examines pre-service teachers' (PSTs) use of Generative AI to refine learning objectives for lesson planning. Through interacting with GenAI, PSTs improve their ability to prompt for tailored feedback and iteratively assess their own work. The findings highlight best practices for prioritizing essential teaching tasks while utilizing AI tools that are reshaping the future of educational technology. This research also offers insights into GenAI’s role in supporting effective lesson planning and fostering professional growth.<br><br></span></p>
